hadiths.text: Narrated AbuWahb al-Jushami,: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Tie the horses, rub down their forelocks and their buttocks (or he said: Their rumps), and put things on their necks, but do not put bowstrings

chapter.ara-name: باب إِكْرَامِ الْخَيْلِ وَارْتِبَاطِهَا وَالْمَسْحِ عَلَى أَكْفَالِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Being Kind To Horses, And Keeping Them, And Rubbing Down Their Rump
